event.title: went to be with her Lord on Wednesday, March 4, 2009

data.event: Arlene M. Rittle, 78, went to be with her Lord on Wednesday, March 4, 2009, passing away in the Good Samaritan Hospital.
She was the wife of Harvey A. Rittle, with whom she was married to for 56 years.

event.title: was born in Jackson Township on May 26, 1930

data.event: She was born in Jackson Township on May 26, 1930, a daughter of the late Ralph and Verna Binner Kneasel.
Funeral service will be held Monday at 1:30 p.m. in the Rohland Funeral Home, 508 Cumberland St., Lebanon.
